title: 23 Furrbulous Feline Memes Who Know They're Fantastic, They Don't Need You to Tell Them That
description: When we say that we want some real cat confidence, we mean that we want to know exactly what we deserve, how much of it, when, and where. Just as when a cat is met with the smell of a yummy treat they know not to ask, but to demand it. They know they deserve it, and they'll make it your problem until you realize it yourself as well. They want it here, they want it now, and they'll get it eventually. This is the kind of cat confidence we want. Also we'd like to be as cute as cats, but we're not that confident yet as to ask for these two things at once. We'll wait patiently.While we wait for this cat confidence, we'd like to help both you and us to pass the time with some furrbulous feline memes. They're some really fantastic memes, and they have all that cat confidence already, so they don't need you to tell them that. But we hope this cat confidence is contagious, because we'd like to have some. At least we know that with these funny cat memes, we'll have a good laugh.
author: Ayala Sorotsky
excerpt: 23 Furrbulous Feline Memes Who Know They're Fantastic, They Don't Need You to Tell Them That - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
When we say that we want some real cat confidence, we mean that we want to know exactly what we deserve, how much of it, when, and where. Just as when a cat is met with the smell of a yummy treat they know not to ask, but to demand it. They know they deserve it, and they'll make it your problem until you realize it yourself as well. They want it here, they want it now, and they'll get it eventually. This is the kind of cat confidence we want. Also we'd like to be as cute as cats, but we're not that confident yet as to ask for these two things at once. We'll wait patiently.

While we wait for this cat confidence, we'd like to help both you and us to pass the time with some furrbulous feline memes. They're some really fantastic memes, and they have all that cat confidence already, so they don't need you to tell them that. But we hope this cat confidence is contagious, because we'd like to have some. At least we know that with these funny cat memes, we'll have a good laugh.
